Author: Tonisim
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: PAYMON NEWS #29 https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/paymon-news-29-fa5336aa4a69  Android:  PMNT wallet is finally ready! We remind you that this is the third wallet in our app that you can use to store and send tokens. The PMNT wallet will become especially relevant when Hive is ready and the token swap takes place. Using a PMNT wallet, you can be sure that your Paymon tokens and coins are safe. Another good news is that Android is coming out next Monday! (Tuesday as the latest date). So we advise all owners of Android smartphones to download the Paymon app faster if you happen to still not have it installed!  iOS:  For iOS release we will have to wait a little longer: it is scheduled for November 15, but there may be slight shifts. We already started testing.  Profit:  Profit platform layout release is coming soon!  As you can see, despite being very busy lately and dissapearing sometimes, we follow the plan.

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 7-25-2018 PAYMON WEEKLY NEWS #15  Here’s a brief summary of what we were doing last week:  WEB  - Fixed that bug, making it impossible to leave the group; - Implemented ETH sending (offers the optimal price for gas); - Almost ready to implement a file server on Google. Now it can store avatars and user backgrounds; - Installed a new library.  iOS  - Created a new repository; - Connected libraries and fixed errors; - Created and optimized a new View Registry;    - Created and optimized a new Authorization View.      Android  - Contact search is ready and we’ve started working on a global search; - Made a contacts’ profile, which will soon have a working wallet; - Dialogue and message search is going to be ready in the near future.  Also, as we mentioned in the previous report, we are going to announce the new and improved version of paymon.org very soon. So, stay tuned and watch our Facebook and Twitter!  https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/paymon-weekly-news-15-de2d27db1a46

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 7-26-2018 HIVE! Important information!  As you probably already know, Hive is our fast and secure blockchain, DAG-based and created on Rust. The Proof of Me verification algorithm allows users to confirm one another’s transactions independently and they are therefore exempt from commissions, miners and the danger of a 51% attack.  Hive is almost ready, and we conducted open alpha-testing for Windows on 10th of July. In case you haven’t get to test our blockchain yet, it is still availabe — all you need is to follow the instruction below:  1. Download and install JRE (Java Runtime Environment) http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html Click accept and then download `Windows x86 Offline` version. 2. Download latest release of Paymon Wallet: https://github.com/PaymonTeam/paymon-wallet/releases/download/0.0.1a/paymon_wallet_0.0.1a.zip  You can also join our Slack testers chat, whether you are going to test Hive or not — you may find answers to some of your technical questions there https://goo.gl/SmiE8K . Test coins are also available on Slack.  We will wait for your comments in our chat! Stay tuned  Regards, Paymon team.  https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/hive-important-information-f1483983faa8

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 7-27-2018 New Paymon.org!  Hello everyone! As promised, we announce the new version of our official site  Paymon.org.    The improved Paymon.org contains all the information about Paymon you might need: our main products for today — Hive, Profit and Paymon Messenger, exchanges on which PMNT is listed, as well as a news block, that will be updated constantly and in time. Also, don’t forget to check out the new design!  For now, Paymon.org is presented in two languages — English and Russian, but will be available to the wider audience in the future.  New site — new start: Paymon is ready to explore new frontiers. Join us!  Release time is 6.00 p.m. GMT. ico.paymon.org will be redirected to paymon.org.  https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/new-paymon-org-38e80f1093c8

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 08-01-2018 PAYMON WEEKLY NEWS #16  It’s time for the weekly news again! Summer is blooming ouside our office windows, but we stay strong and keep on working. So, here’s what we have achieved in the period from last Monday to last Friday:  1. First of all, we updated the Paymon.org: now, refreshed and inspired, we’re starting our work again with renewed vigor!    The site, judging by your comments, turned out to be a worthy effort. Now Paymon.org contains all the necessary information: our main products — Hive, Profit and Paymon Messenger, the exchanges where PMNT is listed, as well as a news block that will be constantly updated.  For now, the site offers two languages, Russian and English, but will be available to a wider audience in the future.  2. As for the blockchain:  - Fixed bugs. - Began to redesign the wallet interface.  3. For iOS:  - Added the function to change your password. - And optimized the application’s overall performance. - Added the function to search and select a country from the list.    4. For Android:  - Made a chat filter: tete-a-tete, all chats, and group chats. - Made a layout to add/remove group admins and display the admins. - Made an add/remove layout for the group black list and to display blocked users. - Built a future attachment feature for transferring cryptocurrency within conversations. - Optimized the application’s performance (launches faster and delays are gone). - Fixed the performance of chat rooms and message scrolling. - Added the ability to forward messages. - Now, it’s possible to set individual chats to “do not disturb”. - Added tumbler settings for the ability to show/hide email, phone, and name.     That’s our news for the week! We want to remind you that at the end of August/beginning of September you can expect a web version for users, as well as a beta version of the Profit platform. See you soon!  source:https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/paymon-weekly-news-16-f78cd9db0a6d

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 8-09-2018 PAYMON WEEKLY NEWS #17  We know that you expect active marketing from us .  but we ask you, friends, to be patient and wait for the beginning of the fall: by this time we are planning to finish the web-version of Paymon and our Profit platform. It will be realistic to expect “to the moon” then, and for now we have another piece of news . because we don’t stand still!  So, the results of our work over the last week: Paymon Web: - Prepared preloader for the block loading; - Added a button to copy the wallet , in the new version, copying the wallet will be easier and more convenient! - Made the emoji library. - Implemented sending messages to new users.  iOS: - Optimized the app. - Developed and applied a new wallet design.    Android: - Fixed minor bugs. - Completed the search for contacts: your own contacts and global search. - Added the “Leave group” button. - Added the function of deleting an already sent message for everyone in the chat. - Payment gateways for cryptocurrency are now in the process of implementation. The Ethereum’s gateway is almost finished!   source: https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/paymon-weekly-news-17-25f62370ca9e

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: 08-13-2018 Paymon and Cryptocean Announce the Launch of Crypto Debit Cards  Two blockchain companies, Paymon and Cryptocean, have finalized a partnership to produce crypto debit cards. Both companies are developing technology for the crypto industry. Paymon is focused on creating a new Hive blockchain system, which will allow users to transfer PMNC (Paymon Coin) without any commissions or delays. The company is also creating a universal infrastructure for working with cryptocurrency assets.  Cryptocean is developing technologies for transferring cryptocurrency into fiat money. The startup is creating a technological franchise that will allow any bank or FinTech project to enter the market with its own plastic card, wallet, and a set of services to meet its customers’ needs. Both companies have achieved impressive results in 2018 so far. Paymon successfully conducted its ICO and will soon release the final version of their own blockchain. Cryptocean established a collaboration with a German bank on the cards issue.  “Not all projects manage to sign actual contracts with major market participants,” explained Paymon CEO, Semyon Gleim. “Therefore, for us, cooperation with Cryptocean is kind of a ‘window to Europe’, and we are a qualitative technical base for them.” “Paymon has great technical experts on board, so we decided together to implement a pilot project to run our technological franchise. This is a win-win situation, when, on the one hand, a FinTech startup gets a turbine that speeds up its entry to the market and, on the other hand, it is another B2B client for us,” explained Yury Myshinsky, CEO of Cryptocean.    So, what are the card’s features? The Fiat card will be connected to the customer’s bank account as usual, but there will also be cryptocurrency operations available in addition to the standard fiat transactions, thanks to integration with the Paymon app and Cryptocean technologies. In the end, the client gets an incredibly interesting product — a card tied to their cryptocurrency account. Card registration will be open in two weeks on the website, www.paymon.org.  source:https://medium.com/@Paymon_official/paymon-and-cryptocean-announce-the-launch-of-crypto-debit-cards-582f43398cf9

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: paymon has partnered with cryptocean. I've just looked at what kind of company that is. When I view the website, it looks legit with a strong team of developers and advisors and work plan. Cryptocean is currently in the pre-ico phase.  I have to say that I have not googling the team members yet or other things have been sorted out. but overall it looks like a legit project  Here some description about cryptocean that I put in a quote so it is not to be confused with the paymon related topic           I have never had as much confidence in a presale ICO investment / project as Paymon.  It is a young team that is reliable and honest about everything. You can see that they are fully committed to making paymon a success and earn their living with it. They are fully committed to making this project a success and a success.  Even their ico token price was cheap. Paymon ICO has already ended a few months ago. I thought it was one of the best icos. One of the few projects where there is sufficient room for a large profit in the long term. Also one of the few projects where you really have something to the tokens. They have raised between 1 and 2 million dollars when it is good.   I must say that Paymon has done a good job before and during the ICO and all promises have been met neatly.  Even now that the ICO has long been over, they are doing a very good job. Their official telegram group is also very nice to be, even think it is one of the best telegram groups. Almost every telegram group in the crypto world is like a chat group with toddlers, spammers. The Telegram group of paymon is completely different. At least there is talk at the level as it should and free of spam messages (hodl, when moon, when micra, and so on).  Many of their team members are very active on telegram. Technical questions can almost almost immediately be answered. What is also a positive point of paymon, that at least they listen to the community. If you have good, strong advice or improve or security points in the development of the entire project, then it is neatly viewed and treated by the dev team. If the item is of added value, it is possibly included in the development.  Here 3 paymon telegram groups OFFICIAL GROUP. (project related questions) https://t.me/paymoneng UNOFFICIAL GROUP (Prices, and non related project) https://t.me/paymon_unofficial PAYMON INFO CHANNEL(Latest update news)  https://t.me/paymonchannel  I have already tested the new blockchain. Sending transactions is super fast. you send it, the receiver has your coins.  Everything is handled sensibly. They just want a healthy natural growth. Developing the blockchain / platform is their priority NR1. If she is a complete working project, they will start marketing. Masternodes would also come or be worked as well.  Paymon is under the radar at the moment. Huge under the radar. For a very suitable price.  It is a brand new blockchain developed by paymon. called HIVE: Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG). DAG is a better, improved version of Blockchain.  HIVE blockchain from paymon is better on all points than any other type of blockchains available, such as Ethereum, Bitcoin, EOS, NEO, Waves and the rest.  Paymon is better on all major points when it comes to payments. unlimited transactions per second, transactions free of charge without fee, processing time transactions with light speed, smart-contracts, cross-chain, atomic swaps, payment cards. go on.  This is what we missed in the crypto world. a coin that can be used in daily life. Buy and pay without additional transaction costs or processing time. A coin that you can quickly pay anywhere at any time with a pass in the supermarket, pumping station, online purchases and much more.  Forget about other projects with Dapp bullshit, smart contract shit and more. This project has the future. Crypto money that is used for daily purchases in the normal world. This project can replace Fiat money, soon even though. Because there are no transaction costs or delays of transactions when it is busy.  All other blockchain projects currently have no future to replace fiat money. Bitcoin either. That will be the digital gold of the future. all inconvenient in use. hard to understand for people who do not know anything about crypto, Traage with transaction speeds, High transaction costs, etcetera

Author: peterkate630
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: About Paymon Our team has been working on Paymon since 2016. This project is going to simplify the interaction between cryptocurrency holders and blockchain technology users. We are bringing the existing in the industry services to a new level and, moreover, introducing new ones.  Paymon suggests its own view of standard Blockchain, introducing ways of dealing with most issues of existing cryptocurrencies: the scaling problem, archaic architecture and high transaction fees. Our platform improves all cryptocurrency instruments: from technology and infrastructure to regulatory compliance with current regulations.  Business platform Profit, developed under our project, will be a universal solution for everyone: from developers and basic users to commercial organizations. Moreover, the project is a great investment opportunity in virtue of its tokens. Our team has currently created a blockchain messenger, which allows its users to safely and easily send each other not only messages, but also cryptocurrency.  We are also developing and suggesting you to try out the groundbreaking technology Hive, which is together with the business platform Profit will allow you not only to create smart-contracts, add your business and perform transactions without any fees, but also to test efficiency and safety of all services yourself.  Everything mentioned above is the result of our team’s hard work, we spent more than two years doing it, and we are happy to present you with what we have achieved so far.

Author: peterkate630
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: Paymon Is a Innovate Blockchain Platform Paymon suggests its own view of standard Blockchain, introducing ways of dealing with most issues of existing cryptocurrencies: the scaling problem, archaic architecture, low speed, and high transaction fees. Our new blockchain Hive improves all cryptocurrency instruments: from technology and infrastructure to regulatory compliance with current regulations. Business platform Profit, developed under our project, will be a universal solution for everyone: from developers and basic users to commercial organizations and ICO projects. Moreover, the project is a great investment opportunity in virtue of its tokens. Our team has currently created a blockchain messenger, which allows its users to safely and easily send each other not only messages, but also cryptocurrency.

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: I found this fresh update in the paymon info telegram channel   PAYMON WEEKLY NEWS #11  Hello everyone! 😊  Here we are to give you the weekly dose of information.  👉 During this week, we have worked efficiently on our app:  - Agreed on cooperation with AnyCharts developers: now we can use great charts and make our app look even better! - Optimized Android code; - Continued the iOS development; - Added the function of creating a chat; - Added “Paymon” widget to the “Money” section; - Optimized the site to 300px resolution; - Continued working on creation of ETH wallets.  👩‍💼 Just to remind you in case you forgot: the main goal of Paymon app is to simplify the operation of cryptocurrency exchange and allow you to receive funds through messages in the chat while communicating with other users📱 After installing the mobile application, you create an account, which is immediately attached to cryptocurrency wallets with zero balance – for now it is Bitcoin and Ethereum, but we are preparing Paymon wallet. Thus, there is no need to register on third-party sites: the system sends cryptocurrency from one purse to another.  However, the most important and long-awaited feature is, for sure, our Profit platform, which also will be available through the app: Profit is meant for businesspersons, who would like to accept payments for their services in cryptocurrency 📲  Besides, in case you get bored using our app, you will be able to play some games through it 😉  We are just as excited as you are to try all the tools we are preparing for you, and we promise to please you with something new soon!

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: That paymon bitcoin can beat as currency can also be viewed in a different way. Paymon may be able to beat Bitcoin on transactions of normal daily purchases in the future  What people want is what it is all about at Paymon. No slow transactions but very fast transaction time even huge crowds on the blockchain fast transactions. But transactions without costs are also a strong point. Just a good coin that can also be used with daily purchases.  Bitcoin will in my eyes have no future as a normal payment tool for your daily purchases at, for example, a supermarket. But in the future bitcoin plays a very important role in the exchange of huge amounts. Just like now is done with gold bars

Author: oapieNL
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: I am now on the computer and have calculated it just as well. I come to 682% bonus tokens extra. And I also thought I had read that unsold tokens were being distributed to the early investors.  I had invested in February or something. That sale ran until 5 March.   But I am very happy how paymon works on everything. The development of the entire platform, but also the trips with conferences, conversations with ambassadors to make contacts to make their product known  You can see that they really put time into the project.  I trust the full 100% of the paymon team. I even think that this is the first in his class. the first ico from Russia that is not a scam  All other Russians who start an ico can accept an example of paymon how you can keep an ico and then just develop everything while the ico is still going on.   I am not planning on selling my tokens anyway. I am especially curious about what we are going to see when everything is ready, both prices of the token, transaction speeds of the blockchain, use of smart contracts and such things   Keep up the good work!

Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: Paymon suggests its own view of standard Blockchain, introducing ways of dealing with most issues of existing cryptocurrencies: the scaling problem, archaic architecture, low speed, and high transaction fees. Our new blockchain Hive improves all cryptocurrency instruments: from technology and infrastructure to regulatory compliance with current regulations. Business platform Profit, developed under our project, will be a universal solution for everyone: from developers and basic users to commercial organizations and ICO projects. Moreover, the project is a great investment opportunity in virtue of its tokens. Our team has currently created a blockchain messenger, which allows its users to safely and easily send each other not only messages, but also cryptocurrency.

After the first round of ICO on March 5, the startup took up developing its own blockchain and cryptocurrency: PMNC (Paymon Coin). At the moment, Paymon is conducting the second round of ICO that ends on May 3. So, here are 5 reasons why it is worth investing in this project.  The Team is Open, Innovative & Dynamic The Improved Blockchain is disruptive Community & Advisers Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/reasons-to-invest-in-paymon/

Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: Since the creators of the project have made it this way, then it is not easier. The PMNT token is needed to create and implement the exchange of other cryptocurrencies through the creation of a smart contract within the Ethereum network. And PMNC is a cryptocurrency that will function on the Paymon platform, that is working on the Hive technology.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: Paymon Set to Make Fund Transfer Easy  The Paymon blockchain platform together with the two applications, Hive and Profit, seek to work together to allow users to convert crypto into fiat and vice versa and also transfer these freely and easily. Besides, the network hopes to enable users to follow the performance of their businesses by tracking the dynamics of their crypto holdings. Better yet, users can communicate and play games on the platform. Though the Paymon network fosters communication, the chats are encrypted and only accessible to the intended recipients.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/paymon-set-to-make-fund-transfer-easy/

Each of them is trying to find the solution to different problems in the industry, but not all are successful. Still there is an example of success. We are talking about the Russian company called Paymon.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/what-is-paymon/

Author: shokhibul
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: This is an oriented acyclic graph, based on which the crypto currency will work. "Hive" makes it possible to carry out transfers without commissions, as well as without waiting for confirmation of transactions. Instead of a standard block, DAG will be used here - a more advanced blockchain.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: It will be interesting how this technology works itself out in action. And still no one has used it?

Author: shokhibul
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: No, some projects already use it. For example, Hive used in IOTA, although they adapted this technology to "Internet stuff", and Paymon will direct all DAG technology to people, which will allow to achieve the maximum transaction speed.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)

Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: Hello! No, iOS version mostly complete. We have about 10 update in line. Problem on Apple side. First problem was because 7 month ago we have been register as private developer, they gave us the way to upload app, after that they asked about company that will have name as app. After this request they close any opportunity to delete or update our app. Then we registered company Paymon LLC, but they still can`t switch developer in AppStore. We sent them a lot of requests. Finally we found the way. But it will be possible only after ICO.

Author: sjyi
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: It's is great to understand the financials of an ICO, but would you be able to clarify some technical matters discussed in the white paper?  Paymon does away with the blockchain. "nstead of the global blockchain, there is a DAG that we call the hive."  There is a great deal of description on nodes choosing transactions to process, which was a very interesting topic compared what other global blockchain based cryptos are doing.  But the white paper does not describe how the distributed ledgers will be consolidated, or at least how they will be searched.  Since this mechanism is missing, I can't tell how the local ledger will be made fault tolerant if a node goes down or will be forced out of the network after being identified as "lazy" or even protect the network from attackers.  To build a confidence in your platform, additional information should be shared.  Thank you,

Author: SparkIt
Title: [ANN][ICO] Paymon - blockchain platform (start ICO 02.02.18)
Body: As I see the biggest problem for the widespread distribution of crypto-currency is that we can not use them everywhere as a means of payment. Different governments of states declare that it is necessary to regulate crypto-currencies, but for some reason all regulation is limited mainly to restrictions and prohibitions. In those countries where they are more loyal to the development of crypto currency, the main problem there is that the business is still afraid to use crypto-currencies.  And trubles is that not enough convenient applications and services.  A large number of ICO focused on the use of blockchain technologies in various fields, but for some reason, few developers think about the need to create infrastructure projects.  I think that such projects as PAYMON should become more. And they will have a chance of success, if the team will focus on the introduction of convenient functionality for business. Because if the crypto-currency is used by business, then we, as ordinary consumers of services, will be able not only to trade in crypto-currencies on the exchange, but also to use them in our everyday life.  I express my respect to the team and I wish them success! Such projects are needed by the crypto-community and the whole world.
